channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 巴尔的摩桥梁坍塌后，已有两人从水中获救。该市消防队长表示，目前仍在搜救中。
item.description:
Two people have been rescued from the water after a Baltimore bridge collapse. The city's fire chief says it remains a search-and-rescue effort. https://t.co/CLFOHE79nI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 26, 2024

item.title: 维基解密创始人朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）因间谍罪被监禁，英国法院要求美国做出保证，避免了立即引渡的命运
item.description:
Jailed WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange staves off immediate extradition on espionage charges as UK court demands assurances from US https://t.co/I8FAcDg0tD

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 26, 2024

item.title: 官员告诉 CNN，巴尔的摩的救援人员正在搜寻因一座主桥倒塌而可能掉入帕塔普斯科河的多人。关注实时更新。
item.description:
Rescuers in Baltimore searching for multiple people who may have fallen into the Patapsco River as a major bridge collapsed, official tells CNN. Follow live updates. https://t.co/YeXe4JUOaQ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）获得的视频显示，巴尔的摩大桥被一艘大船撞击后倒塌
item.description:
Baltimore bridge collapses after being struck by a large ship, according to video obtained by CNN https://t.co/SupAXOUaQr

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 26, 2024

item.title: 大谷翔平说他从未在体育比赛中赌博，也从未要求任何人为他赌博，因为棒球明星的前翻译丑闻正甚嚣尘上
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani says he never gambled on sports or asked anyone to do it for him as scandal involving baseball star's former interpreter swirlshttps://t.co/vIho9igvRC

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国国土安全部告诉 CNN，肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在加利福尼亚州和佛罗里达州的住所遭到搜查，作为正在进行的调查的一部分
item.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs' homes in California and Florida raided as part of an ongoing investigation, Homeland Security tells CNN https://t.co/DmMyXF3uJR

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 法官表示，特朗普因向斯托米-丹尼尔斯支付封口费而被指控的纽约刑事审判将于 4 月 15 日开始，并将挑选陪审团成员
item.description:
Trump's New York criminal trial on charges related to hush money payments to Stormy Daniels will begin on April 15 with jury selection, judge says https://t.co/5HuK8srqBk

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 一名被指控在亚历克斯-默多克谋杀案中篡改陪审团的法院书记员在法官裁定指控不值得重审数月后辞职
item.description:
A court clerk accused of jury tampering in the Alex Murdaugh murder case resigns months after a judge ruled the allegations didn't merit a new trial https://t.co/3XyYb4hYDZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 法院称，特朗普必须在 10 天内缴纳 1.75 亿美元，以满足 4.64 亿美元民事欺诈判决的条件，这为前总统提供了一线生机
item.description:
Court says Trump has to post $175 million in 10 days to meet terms of a $464 million civil fraud judgment, giving the former president a lifeline https://t.co/jDLWtqc7op

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 美国弃权后，联合国安理会通过决议，呼吁立即在加沙停火
item.description:
The UN Security Council passes a resolution calling for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza after the US abstains https://t.co/kpTgWgroyL

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）计划于今年年底卸任。公司董事长和商用飞机部门主管也将离职。
item.description:
Boeing CEO Dave Calhoun plans to step down at the end of the year. The company's chairman and head of the commercial airplane unit are also leaving. https://t.co/5fRPTN9wFK

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 25, 2024

item.title: 一位消息人士称，新泽西州第一夫人塔米-墨菲（Tammy Murphy）将暂停竞选参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）的参议员席位。
item.description:
New Jersey first lady Tammy Murphy is suspending her campaign for Senate seat held by Sen. Bob Menendez, a source says. https://t.co/36EgDZaZvZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 24, 2024

item.title: 尼日利亚州长表示，本月早些时候在尼日利亚被绑架的近 300 名学童已获释
item.description:
Nearly 300 schoolchildren kidnapped in Nigeria earlier this month have been released, governor says https://t.co/TN7XtzXXqK

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 24, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统签署政府拨款法案，避免了政府部分停摆
item.description:
President Biden signs the government funding bill, averting a partial shutdownhttps://t.co/kkhWxgHxNX

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科地区音乐厅袭击事件死亡人数增至至少 115 人
item.description:
Death toll from Moscow-area concert hall attack rises to at least 115 people https://t.co/PmToRIiojI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2024

item.title: 死亡人数升至 93 人，俄罗斯当局称四名直接参与莫斯科地区音乐厅袭击事件的人员已被拘留
item.description:
Russian authorities say the four people directly involved in Moscow-area concert venue attack have been detained as death toll rises to 93 https://t.co/k8Crgju7uz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2024

item.title: 参议院在最后一刻达成协议后通过了 1.2 万亿美元的政府拨款方案，避免了部分停摆
item.description:
Senate passes $1.2 trillion government funding package after last-minute agreement, averting a partial shutdown https://t.co/vmlbgJjz1l

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2024

item.title: 截止日期已过，但参议员有望在周六清晨批准政府拨款方案
item.description:
Deadline passes but senators are on track to approve government funding package early Saturday morning https://t.co/OWqutIEL4j

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 23, 2024

item.title: 美国职业棒球联盟（MLB）宣布，已就有关洛杉矶道奇队双向明星大谷翔平及其长期翻译水原一平的指控展开调查
item.description:
MLB announced it has launched an investigation into the allegations surrounding Los Angeles Dodgers two-way star Shohei Ohtani and his longtime interpreter Ippei Mizuhara https://t.co/gQYYDRsv9U

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: ISIS 恐怖组织宣称对造成至少 40 人死亡的莫斯科地区音乐会场袭击事件负责
item.description:
ISIS terror group claims responsibility for attack on Moscow-area concert venue that left at least 40 dead https://t.co/KLmY7IIXtZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯国家媒体称，莫斯科附近的一个音乐会场遭到袭击，造成至少 40 人死亡，100 多人受伤
item.description:
At least 40 people were killed and over 100 injured in an attack on a concert venue near Moscow, Russian state media says https://t.co/gCb9oex6Gv

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯国家媒体称，武装人员袭击了莫斯科附近的一个音乐厅。死伤人数不详。
item.description:
Armed men attacked a concert hall near Moscow, Russian state media says. The number of dead and injured is unknown. https://t.co/Unp4pxXA9F

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯瑟琳透露自己罹患癌症，并在一段视频中表示诊断结果让她 "非常震惊"。
item.description:
Catherine, Princess of Wales, reveals she has cancer, saying in a video message that the diagnosis was a "huge shock" https://t.co/bbZIZEd8WT

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 美国共和党众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）对刚刚通过的政府拨款法案感到愤怒，提出将迈克-约翰逊赶下议长职位的动议
item.description:
GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene files a motion to oust Mike Johnson from the speakership, in anger about the government funding bill that just passed https://t.co/4lb81cIKDz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 众议院投票通过关键的政府支出法案，参议院在今晚快速逼近的停摆最后期限前展开冲刺。
item.description:
The House votes to approve key government spending bills, setting off a sprint in the Senate ahead of a fast-approaching shutdown deadline tonight. https://t.co/kEpgei3jIY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 警方称，一名大学生在离开纳什维尔一家酒吧后失踪，现已发现其死亡，为期两周的搜寻工作就此结束。
item.description:
A college student who disappeared after leaving a bar in Nashville has been found dead, police say, ending a two-week searchhttps://t.co/Dyg9OaGeYt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 投资者同意让 Truth Social 成为上市公司。这一消息为特朗普带来了数十亿美元的意外之财，但也有一些注意事项。
item.description:
Investors OK a deal to make Truth Social a public company. The news generates a multi-billion dollar windfall for Trump, with caveats. https://t.co/GNJFr01QRy

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国否决美国支持的联合国安理会决议，呼吁以色列-哈马斯停火并释放人质
item.description:
Russia and China veto US-backed UN Security Council resolution calling for an Israel-Hamas ceasefire and release of hostages https://t.co/wlrrbwbMaT

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 22, 2024

item.title: 陷入困境的参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯宣布不再作为民主党人竞选连任，但希望 "免罪 "能让他作为独立候选人参选
item.description:
Embattled Sen. Bob Menendez announces he will not run for reelection as a Democrat but hopes an "exoneration" will allow him to run as an independenthttps://t.co/m82p6T1ovB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州当局在追捕和枪击三名警官受伤后抓获在逃囚犯和同伙。
item.description:
Authorities capture escaped Idaho inmate and accomplice after manhunt and shooting that left 3 officers injured. https://t.co/3XyPJfliDt

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 21, 2024
